name: 英國史（一）
description: 探索英國文明之起源和英國國家與制度之形成與發展，以為瞭解近代英國之基礎。其涵蓋的內容包括大不列顛群島之地理環境、英國的史前文明、羅馬時期、盎格魯—薩克遜人之入侵、七國時代、諾曼底人征服、中古封建、都鐸王朝、宗教改革等課題。
goals: 理解英國古代、中世紀以迄於都鐸王朝之歷史發展
syllabus:
授課方式：16週

第一週 **課程介紹、導論**

第二週 **羅馬時期的不列顛**

史料閱讀：Bede, _The Ecclesiastical History of the English People_, ed., and trans., Judith McClure and Roger Collins (Oxford: Oxford University Press, 1994), 9-21.

參考閱讀： Martin Millett, Louise Revell and Alison Moore, ed., _Oxford Handbook of Roman Britain_ (Oxford: Oxford University Press, 2016).

第三週 **盎格魯・薩克森不列顛 1: 從異教徒到基督徒**

指定閱讀:  Floral Spigel, 'The "tabernacula" of Gregory The Great and The Conversion of Anglo-Saxon England', _Anglo-Saxon Englan_d, 36 (2007), 1-13. 

第四週 **盎格魯・薩克森不列顛 2: 維京人入侵與王國統一**

指定閱讀：M.K. Lawson, 'The Collection of Danegeld and Heregeld in the reigns of Aethelred II and Cnut', _The English Historical Revie_w, 99.393 (1984), 721-738. 

參考閱讀：

J. A. Green, (April 1981). ‘The Last Century of Danegeld', _The English Historical Review,_ 96 (1981), 241–258.

W. M. Ormrod, Joanna Story and Elizabeth M. Tyler, ed., _Migrants in Medieval England, 500-1500_ (Oxford: The British Academy, 2020).

Mark Atherton, _The Making of England: a new history of the Anglo-Saxon World_ (London: I.B. Tauris, 2017).

Douglas Woodruff, _The Life and Times of Alfred the Great_ (London: Weidenfeld and Nicolson, 1993).

第五週 **1066: 諾曼征服與征服者威廉**

史料閱讀: The Bayeux Tapestry. See https://www.readingmuseum.org.uk/collections/britains-bayeux-tapestry

指定閱讀：M. T. Clanchy, _England and Its Rulers 1066-1307_, 4th edn (Wiley Blackwell, 2014), 23-46.

第六週 **建立新秩序：末日審判書中的土地與人民**

史料閱讀：_Domesday Book_, see https://opendomesday.org/book/bedfordshire/01/

指定閱讀： Clanchy, _England and Its Rulers 1066-1307_, 47-60.

參考閱讀：Robin Fleming, _Domesday Book and The Law: society and legal custom in early medieval England_ (Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 1998).

第七週 **共同法的發展**

指定閱讀：Paul Brand, _The Making of The Common Law_ (Hambledon Continuum, 1993), 77-102.

參考閱讀: John Hudson, _The Formation of English Common Law_ 2nd edn (Oxford: Routledge, 2018), 110-146

第八週 **期中考試** 

第九週 **從《大憲章》(Magna Carta) 到《西敏寺條約》(The Provisions of Westminster)：王權、貴族與國會**

史料閱讀：The 1215 Magna Carta, the 1225 Magna Carta, The Provisions of Westminster, . See _English Historical Documents_ Vol. 3, ed., Harry Rothwell (London: Eyre & Spottiswoode, 1975), 316-323.

Simon de Montfort’s summons for a parliament, 1265, see https://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/education/resources/magna-carta/montforts-parliament/

指定閱讀： Clanchy, _England and Its Rulers 1066-1307_, 267-283.

第十週 **內憂外患時期: 蘇格蘭第一次獨立戰爭、英法百年戰爭以及玫瑰戰爭** 

指定閱讀：Chris Given-Wilson ed., _An Illustrated History of Late Medieval England_ (Manchester University Press, 1996), 229-270.

第十一週 **經濟與城鎮發展** 

史料閱讀：T_owns in Medieval England: selected sources_, trans., and ed., Gervase Rosser (Manchester: Manchester University Press, 2016), 66-69; 82-91.

指定閱讀：Chris Given-Wilson ed., _An Illustrated History of Late Medieval England_, 41-57.

參考閱讀：Susan Rose, The Wealth of England: the medieval wool trade and its political importance 1100-1600 (Oxford: Oxbow Book, 2018).

第十二週 **榮光女王：伊莉莎白時期的英格蘭**

史料閱讀: Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603, _Elizabethan England and Europe: forty unprinted letters from Elizabeth to protestant power_, ed., E. I. Kouri (London: University of London, Institute of Historical Research, 1982).

The Elizabethan Poor Law, 1601, see http://www.workhouses.org.uk/poorlaws/1601act.shtml

參考閱讀：G. R. Elton, 'Parliament in The Sixteenth Century', _The Historical Journal,_ 22.2 (1979), 255-278. 

第十三週 **啓蒙與復辟：斯圖亞特時期的英格蘭**

指定閱讀：N. H. Keeble, _The Restoration: England in the 1660s_ (Malden, MA: Blackwell Publishing, 2002), 32-53.

參考閱讀：John Seed, _Dissenting Histories: Religious Division and the Politics of Memory in Eighteenth-Century England_ (Edinburgh: Edinburgh University Press, 2008).

第十四週 **帝國的基礎：光榮革命、金融革命與工業革命**

史料閱讀：The Royal Charter of the East India Company 1601, see https://en.wikisource.org/wiki/Charter\_Granted\_by\_Queen\_Elizabeth\_to\_the\_East\_India\_Company / The Royal Charter of the Bank of England 1694. See https://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/6134/response/14050/attach/2/Bank%20of%20England%20Charter%201694.pdf?cookie\_passthrough=1 https://www.bankofengland.co.uk/museum/online-collections/archive-gallery/founding-documents ;

指定閱讀: KOJI YAMAMOTO, 'Piety, Profit and PUblic Service in the Financial Revolution', _The English HIstorical Review_, 126.521 (2011), 806-834. 

參考閱讀：Henry G. Roseveare, _The Financial Revolution_ (London, New York: Routledge, 2014).

第十五週 **莎士比亞戲劇演出**

第十六週 **期末考**
